author: ethdreamer
content: So the [execution-api structures](http://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/v1.0.0-alpha.4/src/engine/specification.md#executionpayloadv1) are versioned now (e.g. `ExecutionPayloadV1`). I'm trying to understand the motivation behind this. Will consensus clients (in the future) need to support multiple versions simultaneously? Will we be querying the execution engine to determine the latest version supported and using that?
